hero.title: TK & Associates Law Office - Superior Legal Solutions
subtitle: The Ho Chi Minh City Department of Justice licensed TK & Liên Danh Law Office on April 1, 2014. The Chief of Office is lawyer Khương Đình Tiến.
The office’s scope covers litigation under applicable law, legal consulting, delivery of legal services and out-of-court representation for legal matters.

faqs.question: What are the main areas of legal expertise TK & Associates offers?
faqs.answer: TK & Associates specializes in corporate law, intellectual property, family law, and dispute resolution.

faqs.question: How can I schedule a consultation with TK & Associates?
faqs.answer: You can schedule a consultation by contacting us via phone, email, or filling out the consultation form on our website.

faqs.question: What are the consultation fees?
faqs.answer: Consultation fees vary depending on the complexity of your case. Please contact us for a detailed fee schedule.

faqs.question: Can TK & Associates help with international legal issues?
faqs.answer: Yes, TK & Associates has experience in handling international cases, including cross-border mergers and intellectual property disputes.

faqs.question: What documents should I bring to my first consultation?
faqs.answer: Please bring any relevant documents such as contracts, agreements, or correspondence related to your case.

terms_acceptance.title: Terms Acceptance
content: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

use_of_information.title: Use of Information
content: The information on this website is for general reference purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. You should not rely on this information for any commercial or illegal purpose.

copyrights_ip.title: Copyright and Intellectual Property
content: The content on this website, including but not limited to text, images, and logos, is the property of the law firm and is protected by copyright laws. Any reproduction, distribution, or other use of the content requires prior written consent from the firm.

limitation_of_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
content: The law firm shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this website, including but not limited to technical failures, inaccuracies in content, or links to third-party websites.

changes_to_terms_of_use.title: Changes to Terms of Use
content: The law firm reserves the right to change or modify these terms of use without prior notice. You should review these terms regularly for any updates.

third_party_links.title: Third-Party Links
content: This website may contain links to other websites. The law firm is not responsible for the content or privacy practices of such websites.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
content: The firm is committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with applicable laws.

not_found_page.title: Page Not Found
not_found_page.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
